attributes.action: Discontinue the proposals to build a new eco-town in the Marston Vale, Bedfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Marston Vale is an area in Mid Bedfordshire between Junction 13 of the M1 and Bedford.
It is currently the location of a proposed new eco-town, which aims to bring 15,000 homes to this mainly rural area.
We believe that this will remove the identity of the villages in the area, mostly dating back to the middle ages.

We therefore request the Prime Minister discontinue the proposals for the Marston Vale.
